name: Global uniques
uniques: Triggers a [Ancient] event <for [Major] Civilizations> <upon entering the [Ancient era]> <before the [Classical era]> <upon turn end>
Triggers a [Classical] event <for [Major] Civilizations> <upon entering the [Classical era]>
Triggers a [Medieval] event <for [Major] Civilizations> <upon entering the [Medieval era]>
[+1] Movement <for [All] units> <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Assyrians] is constructed>
[+100]% Yield from pillaging tiles <for [All] units> <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Assyrians] is constructed>
[+1 Food] from every [Plains] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Harappans] is constructed>
[+1 Food] from every [River] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Harappans] is constructed>
[+50]% [Gold] from every [improved] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Aksumites] is constructed>
[Gold] cost of purchasing [All] buildings [-25]% <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Carthaginians] is constructed>
[+20]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all citiess] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Mexica] is constructed>
[+2] Movement <for [All] units> <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Mexica] is constructed>
[+2 Gold] from every [Luxury resource] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Ghanaians] is constructed>
[+1 Gold] from every [Luxury resource] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Ghanaians] is constructed>
[+1 Gold] per [1] population [in all cities] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Dutch] is constructed>
[+3 Gold] from each Trade Route <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Venetians] is constructed>
[+10]% [Food] [in all cities] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Mexicans] is constructed>
[+10]% [Production] [in all cities] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Australians] is constructed>
[+3 Food] per [1] population [in all cities] <for [Major] Civilizations> <if [The Turks] is constructed>
